text.0: to indra to the mighty steer may these goldcoloured juices go.
text.1: drops rapidly produced that find the light of heaven.
text.2: effused this juice victorious flows for indra for his maintenance.
text.3: soma bethinks him of the conqueror as he knows.
text.4: may indra in his raptures gain from him the grasp that gathers spoil.
text.5: and winning waters wield the steerstrong thunderbolt.
text.6: flow vigilant for indra thou soma yea indu run thou on.

text.8: do thou allbeautiful purify for indras sake the mighty juice.
text.9: pathmaker thou far seeing with a thousand ways.
text.10: best finder of prosperity for us most rich in sweets for gods.
text.11: proceed thou loudly roaring on a thousand paths.
text.12: o indu with thy streams in might flow for the banquet of the gods.
text.13: rich in meath soma in our beaker take thy place.
text.14: thy drops that swim in water have exalted indra to delight.
text.15: the gods have drunk thee up for immortality.
text.16: stream opulence to us ye drops of soma pressed and purified.
text.17: pouring down rain from heaven in hoods and finding light.
text.18: soma while filtered with his wave flows through the long wool of the sheep.
text.19: shouting while purified before the voice of song.
text.20: with songs they send the mighty forth sporting in wood above the fleece.
text.21: our psalms have glorified him of the triple height.

text.23: and lifting up his voice while filtered glided on.
